name: Galaxy Guardians
description:
When the Galaxy is in danger, we turn to the GALAXY GUARDIANS to protect us! They live on a small planet called Earth, frolicking in the Antarctic waters while they await the call to action! They have intense fish breath, and they are not who you think they are...

Do you have what it takes to save the galaxy? Find out with this innovative take on the space shooter game! Your movements control the Guardian as he flies through space fighting off invaders.

Turn your device to aim, then tap or hold your finger on screen to fire. Swipe left and right to dodge enemy lasers. It's easy to pick up and play, but tricky to master the ways of the Guardians!

Features:
- Innovative movement based controls.
- Classic 80s space shooter game play reinvented in 3D for the iPhone's gyroscopic controls!
- 3 difficulty levels.
- Brag to your friends about how awesome you are on Facebook and Twitter.
- Tap crystals dropped by invaders for power ups!
- Authentic Penguin Sounds! (Yes, you heard us!)

So come and join the Galaxy Guardians and help save us all!

YOU WILL BELIEVE A PENGUIN CAN FLY!
